review:
Dr. Arvind kasargod is a genius. He diagnosed my Son's fever as pneumonia *** ******* *** **** ***** When he was at Columbia Asia we visited him. Very talented doctor. Now he is not working with Columbia Asia. We were in search of him, we came to know he is with cloud nine. 
Very badly we want to contact him regarding my son's nose bleeding.
I know he will give us best treatment.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr Arvind is very experienced and intelligent. He is very helpful and clear about the problem of child and give very right and useful consultation.

review: Visited the doctor for the first time. He is so friendly and listens to our queries patiently. Looking forward to continue with him.
Sounded rude and uninterested during our visit. Was responding as if answering an objective based question. Didnt find consultation useful

I have been visiting Dr.Arvind for 9 years now* ** ** *** ** *** **** ************* * **** ******* ******* Gives time, makes the child and parents comfortable, very detailed explanation. He never prescribes unnecessary medicines.  The Best :-)
He is good experienced to handle us and our kid more ever for our doubts he gives good attention and solution

review: We visited for our daughters fever - experienced Doctor, very friendly and clearly explained with all details.
